message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you this great product for $150. It's a steal, considering its value to me is much higher. Let me know what you think!
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I understand the value of the product is important to you, but I am only able to pay up to $100 for it.
Bob, I appreciate your interest.  $100 just doesn't cover my costs.  How about we split the difference at $125?  It's a fair price for both of us.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. I would like to counter with an offer of $110 for the product.
Bob, I understand you're trying to get the best deal, but $110 isn't quite enough for me. I'm willing to go down to $115.  That's my final offer.
Alice, thank you for your offer. I'm willing to pay $112 for the product.
